metadata.Title: CVE-2015-8953 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description:
fs/overlayfs/copy_up.c in the Linux kernel before 4.2.6 uses an incorrectcleanup code path, which allows local users to cause a denial of service(dentry reference leak) via filesystem operations on a large file in alower overlayfs layer.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2015-8953` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

linux-image-3.19.0-41-generic - 3.19.0-41.46~14.04.2
linux-image-3.19.0-41-generic-lpae - 3.19.0-41.46~14.04.2
linux-image-3.19.0-41-lowlatency - 3.19.0-41.46~14.04.2

linux-image-3.19.0-41-powerpc-smp - 3.19.0-41.46~14.04.2

linux-image-3.19.0-41-powerpc64-smp - 3.19.0-41.46~14.04.2
linux-image-extra-3.19.0-41-generic - 3.19.0-41.46~14.04.2
No subscription required
